page.title: Style Guide - Typography Page
page.paragraph: This page presents the typographical styling for the style guide. You should pay attention to the intended purpose of the elements and how well they contrast with other elements on the page.

div.paragraph: Presented here are the titles for the style guide. Keep in mind the following criteria when evaluating the styles.

list.list-item: Are larger titles actually larger than smaller titles?
Does the font choice fit the overall design and purrpose of the business?
Is the spacing above and below the title intended?
Are the fonts more expressive than textual?

div.paragraph: Here we present some of the other stylistic elements that are intended to operate within large bodies of text. The Inset Text element is intended to present textual information that is an aside to the current textual content. It in someway relates, but is separate from. In contrast we end with a Well element that separates content is a more absolute sense.
